comment: Banquet servers set up for events, carry trays, serve guests, and clean up at the event's conclusion. Set up can include putting out tablecloths and place settings, arranging table placement and putting up a buffet/dinner course.
Restaurant servers work in the main area of the restaurant to serve foods and drinks, and removing dinnerware from the table in a timely manner.

Setup staffs are in charge of setting up tables and chairs, helping with audio-visual equipment, hanging signs, placing decorations, setting out materials such as program books and putting together buffet tables.
Ushers are responsible for the seating arrangement of the patrons for the events.
Banquet Kitchen helpers prepare plating for dishes, placing of ingredients and some ad-hoc duties. Generally, there are no serving for banquet kitchen helpers.
Melt Cafe is a buffet restaurant located in Mandarin Oriental. Melt staff work in the main area of the restaurant to assist in removing dinnerware from the tables in a timely manner
Dolce Vita is an Italian restaurant located in Mandarin Oriental. Dolce Vita staff work in the main area of the restaurant to assist in removing dinnerware from the tables in a timely manner.
Cherry Garden is a Chinese restaurant located in Mandarin Oriental. Cherry Garden staff work in the main area of the restaurant to assist in removing dinnerware from the tables in a timely manner.
The Kitchen Table (TKT) is a buffet restaurant located in W Sentosa. TKT staff work in the back area of the restaurant to prepare settings for the front area.
During the training, part-timers are taught on the dos and donâ€™ts, basic service standard and basic etiquette for banquet. Part-Timers who attend the training are given priority in bookings.
You need to have at least 5 times working experience to work for jobs tagged with Banquet (Experienced). These events require more experienced staffing due to the event requirements

Banquet servers set up for events, carry trays, serve guests, and clean up at the event's conclusion. Set up can include putting out tablecloths and place settings, arranging table placement and putting up a buffet/dinner course. The hotel requires male for this slot.

Banquet servers set up for events, carry trays, serve guests, and clean up the event's conclusion. Set up can include putting out tablecloths and place settings, arranging table placement and putting up a beffet/dinner course. This slot is $12/hr

Staffs for Pool Party help out with the event manager in regards to setting up of champagne section and tear down when event ends
Opus is a bar and grill restaurant located in Hilton Hotel. Part timers help out at the restaurant serving drnks and food. Part timers also assist the manager for ad-hoc duties
Opus is a bar and grill restaurant located in Hilton Hotel. Part timers working at the bar helped out with serving drnks and clearing glasses
The bar part-time assist the bar managers with the dispensing and distribution of both alcohol and non-alcoholic drinks. 18 years old and above

Logistics part-timer assist the logistics manager in the delivering of cooked/uncooked food to the different outlets around the resort.

Coffee Lounge is a restaurant located at Goodwood Park Hotel. Part-timers work in the main area of the restaurant to assist in removing dinnerware from the tables in a timely manner.
Performs simple task of cutting, live station manning, assist chef in charge with miscellaneous task and general housekeeping of kitchen.
Assisting guest in the e-booking of appointments to meet the Fengshui Master during the event.
